title: Construction Management Engineering Curriculum Reform: Mobile-Based Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Reconfiguration of mobile-friendly content is necessary to address credit reduction demands and improve the educational effectiveness of existing courses.

learning_goals: Apply mathematical modeling methods for construction site budget management and process optimization to solve practical problems.
Maintain self-directed learning for at least three hours per week using microlearning content provided via a mobile platform.
Achieve at least 80% learning outcomes per stage based on feedback received through formative assessments.

resources: Real-Time Collaboration Tools (e.g., Miro, Google Jamboard)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
